attributes.action: Restrict lorries of over 7 Tonne to lane one of the motorway between 0700hrs to 0900hrs and 1500hrs to 1800hrs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In an effort to reduce road congestion I would like to see lorries limited to lane one at the times suggested from Monday to Friday. Alongside this I would like the police and/or The Highways Agency to enforce lane discipline on motorways and prevent drivers hogging the second and third lanes.
